description: Mobile techniques used by BrainTest, ATT&CK software S0293 v1.1
name: BrainTest (S0293)

techniques.comment: Original samples of BrainTest download their exploit packs for rooting from a remote server after installation.
Some original variants of BrainTest had the capability to automatically root some devices, but that behavior was not observed in later samples.

BrainTest provided capabilities that allowed developers to use compromised devices to post positive reviews on their own malicious applications as well as download other malicious applications they had submitted to the Play Store.
BrainTest uses root privileges (if available) to copy an additional Android app package (APK) to /system/priv-app to maintain persistence even after a factory reset.
BrainTest stores a secondary Android app package (APK) in its assets directory in encrypted form, and decrypts the payload at runtime.
